member.name: MIB_IPADDRROW
member.summary: TheMIB_IPADDRROW specifies information for a particular IPv4 address in the structure.

member.name: MIB_IPADDRROW.dwAddr
member.summary: The IPv4 address in network byte order.

member.name: MIB_IPADDRROW.dwIndex
member.summary: The index of the interface associated with this IPv4 address.

member.name: MIB_IPADDRROW.dwMask
member.summary: The subnet mask for the IPv4 address in network byte order.

summary.para: The broadcast address in network byte order. A broadcast address is typically the IPv4 address with the host portion set to either all zeros or all ones.
The proper value for this member is not returned by the function.

member.name: MIB_IPADDRROW.dwReasmSize
member.summary: The maximum re-assembly size for received datagrams.

summary.para: The address type or state. This member can be a combination of the following values.
